text: inna fi khalqi l-samawati wal-ardi wa-ikh'tilafi al-layli wal-nahari wal-ful'ki allati tajri fi l-bahri bima yanfaʿu l-nasa wama anzala l-lahu mina l-samai min main fa-ahya bihi l-arda baʿda mawtiha wabatha fiha min kulli dabbatin watasrifi l-riyahi wal-sahabi l-musakhari bayna l-samai wal-ardi laayatin liqawmin yaʿqiluna
